caption.title: Regional trends in giant kelp biomass and SST.
caption.p: ( a) Seasonal canopy anomalies of giant kelp biomass estimated from Landsat 5 Thematic Mapper and Landsat 7 Enhanced Thematic Mapper for 1984–2015. ( b) Monthly SST anomalies from National Climatic Data Center Optimal Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature data for 1984–2015. Data are shown for the counties of Santa Barbara, Los Angeles and San Diego, which span the 450 km coastline of southern California and ∼2° latitude (34.5 N in Santa Barbara and 32.2 N in San Diego). Data for 2014–2015 are shown in red.
